question: Joshua was a pen pal with 5 people. He stopped being penpals with 2 of them. They each send 2 letters a week that are 9 pages long. He responds in kind. He can write a page every 12 minutes. How many hours does he spend writing a week?
answer:
Joshua is penpals with 5-2=<<5-2=3>>3 people
Thus he gets 3*2=<<3*2=6>>6 letters a week
So he writes 6*9=<<6*9=54>>54 pages a week
So he writes for 54*12=<<54*12=648>>648 minutes a week
So he writes 648/60=<<648/60=10>>10 hours a week
#### 10
